mapper.select: select * from note n left join account c on n.accountId=c.accountId where n.noteId=#{noteId}
mapper.insert:
insert into note (noteId,accountId,createdTime,content,title,photos,babyId) values(#{noteId},#{accountId},#{createdTime},#{content},#{title},#{photos},#{babyId})
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS noteId
